question: 不孝者
sourceMnemonic: Remember how <ja>不孝</ja> is "disobedience to parents"? Well, <kanji>someone</kanji> who shows <kanji>disobedience to parents</kanji> is a <vocabulary>disobedient child</vocabulary> or an <vocabulary>unfilial child</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: <ja>不孝</ja> is a reading you should know already. Add the <ja>もの</ja> reading for <ja>者</ja> and you have yourself a reading. Now go be obedient to your parents and keep studying your kanji.
